mapper.sql: s_id, c_id, t_id, attendance_score, task_score, professionalism_score, performance_score, summary_score, practice_result_score, company_score, school_score, total_score
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from sx..assessment
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into sx..assessment
s_id,
c_id,
t_id,
attendance_score,
task_score,
professionalism_score,
performance_score,
summary_score,

mapper.update:
update sx..assessment
s_id = #{record.s_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
c_id = #{record.c_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
t_id = #{record.t_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},

summary_score = #{record.summary_score,jdbcType=INTEGER},

company_score = #{record.company_score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
school_score = #{record.school_score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total_score = #{record.total_score,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update sx..assessment set s_id = #{record.s_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, c_id = #{record.c_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, t_id = #{record.t_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, attendance_score = #{record.attendance_score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, task_score = #{record.task_score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, professionalism_score = #{record.professionalism_score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, performance_score = #{record.performance_score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, summary_score = #{record.summary_score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, practice_result_score = #{record.practice_result_score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, company_score = #{record.company_score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, school_score = #{record.school_score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total_score = #{record.total_score,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sx..assessment
attendance_score = #{attendance_score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
task_score = #{task_score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
professionalism_score = #{professionalism_score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
performance_score = #{performance_score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
summary_score = #{summary_score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
practice_result_score = #{practice_result_score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
company_score = #{company_score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
school_score = #{school_score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total_score = #{total_score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where s_id = #{s_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and c_id = #{c_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t_id = #{t_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
